text: Meilleur restaurant de sushis sur le plateau. Toujours un enorme plaisir d'y aller et surtout, le prix est plus qu'abordable. Les sushis sont tous plus bons les uns que les autres et le personnel est tres sympathique.

Nice personal touches on the food, everything fresh and flavorful! Worth a meal when in the neighborhood and priced reasonable. Owner/chef makes each dish with passion and treats his customers well! My wife and I will be back for another fine meal whenever we come back to the city of Montreal!
Let the chef/owner treat you on a ride. Love this place! A hidden gem.

It's a nice little restaurant better for a take out than a night at this place. It's a bit like a cafeteria and need a touch of oriental decoration and there is not a lot of place.   I think most client call and take out food to eat at home. Anyway the food is nice but a bit pricey for what you have. They take care to do the sushis well.   C'est un bon petit restaurant plus approprié pour un repas à emporter que pour manger sur place. Le restaurant me fait penser à une petite cafétéria et aurait besoin d'un peu de décoration oriental afin d'avoir l'air moins moche.   La place est tellement plus petite que je pense que la majorité des clients passe chercher des sushis pour les manger à la maison.   Donc la nourriture est faites avec soins quoiqu'elle soit un peu chère pour le prix.

Super delicious veggie sushi, and really quite reasonably priced! The sweet potato tempura roll is especially delicious, but really, they were all good. The owner is really nice too - we can after they were technically closed, and he was happy to make us some rolls to go. And he gave us extra wasabi, ginger, and soy sauce. This is a business I'm really happy to support!

Good sushi! My friends and I love this place.  We come here a lot. It's not a fancy sit down place, and many people just get take-out, but it's very quite and therefore a prime spot for catching up with friends (especially compared to other places in the plateau that are a bit noisier). We usually arrive as a group and it's easy to hear the conversation on the other end of the table.  We also enjoy their bring-your-own-wine policy.  Sitting outside in the summer is great, but it's nice and cozy inside during winter.  Highly recommended.  They do take their time preparing the dishes, so it can take up to an 40-50 min to get the food if you're in a large group. but that's the only downside.  They have a large selection including many veggie options. We also like sharing the big platters sometimes.  Highly recommended!
J'ai adoré leurs sushis, ils sont absolument délicieux et très frais! Le choix est très varié, et les prix sont doux. L'endroit est petit mais les sushis en valent largement la peine!

Was delish! Loved the Hawaii sushi roll. The pineapple was very fresh and delicious! The service was average, but the folks who work there seemed super sweet and were very friendly. Will definitely be returning soon!

C'est facile de passer Rose Sushi sans même le remarquer, mais ce petit restaurant charmant de sushi vaut vraiment la peine de l'essayer. On y est allé ce soir et c'étais bien plus qu'attendue. Sur le menu il y avait des combinaisons que je n'ai jamais vu dans les rouleaux, comme ceux avec des fraises ou avec du pamplemousse. On a essayé celui avec fraises et il était très bon. Et leur sushi plus traditionnel était de trés  bon qualité et était plein de saveur aussi. La prochaine fois que vous pensez de sushi dans le quartier latin, essayer certainement Rose Sushi.
